summary: This is an email dated July 10, 2019, requesting assistance for a potential search warrant execution at Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence for digital media and computer equipment. It notes that most of the investigative team (C20) is in Florida interviewing victims.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The email discusses a potential search warrant at his Manhattan residence for digital media and computer equipment.

persons.name: SSA
persons.context: The email is copied to SSA, and recipients are asked to respond back to the sender and SSA if they can assist.

connections.description: SSA is part of the law enforcement team investigating Epstein, as indicated by the email discussing a search warrant at Epstein's residence.

events.title: Potential search warrant at Epstein's Manhattan residence
events.description: The email indicates C20 may need to execute another search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's residence in Manhattan for digital media and computer equipment.

events.title: C20 team interviewing victims in Florida
events.description: The email states that most of the C20 investigative team is in Florida interviewing victims.

keyFacts: Law enforcement (C20) was planning a potential search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's Manhattan residence for digital media and computer equipment as of July 10, 2019.
Most of the C20 investigative team was in Florida interviewing victims at that time, indicating an active, multi-state investigation.
The email requests assistance for the potential Manhattan operation, suggesting resource constraints or the need for specialized personnel.
The document shows ongoing investigative activity related to Epstein shortly before his arrest on July 6, 2019 (publicly known date).
